name: Constellar Apollo
text: Once per turn (Quick Effect): You can detach 1 Xyz Material from this card, then target 1 card on the field; negate its effects until the end of the turn, and if you do you can: immediately after this effect resolves, XYZ Summon 1 Rank 5 "tellar" Xyz monster using this card as a material (XYZ materials attached to this card also become Xyz Materials on this card.
